modName: Raven the Vampire Hunter - Ready for Dawnguard
summary: This is my current player character I created in order to walk through the new DLC. I decided to make him now available as a follower. I hope you enjoy your new mate! Bring the undead down!
descriptionHtml:
[DESCRIPTION]

His name is Raven and he can be found at Dead Man\'s Drink in Falkreath. Just speak to him and he will follow.

[INSTALLATION]

Just open the file and copy it to your skyrim folder (located in C/Programs/Steam/SteamApps/Common/Skyrim).

[REQUIREMENTS]

Dawnguard required !!!

For a proper appearance you need:

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4141]High res face maps[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4784]High Res Scars[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15641]Better Male Presets[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2488]Better males by Chris57 and FavoredSoul[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168]ApachiiSkyhair[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13722]The Eyes of Beauty[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11283]ZariasPiercings[/url] + [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13642]Retexture[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21125]Dread Hunter Armor[/url] 
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12092]Cloaks of Skyrim[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16438]Bandolier[/url] +
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17805]for NPC[/url]

[KNOWN ISSUES]

None. Please let me know if there are any.
author: Faraodir
